_sText:
This is a remake of gg_shotty, I have always liked the faced paced feel of this map, but every remake of it was of poor quality, usually full bright. Here is my version, meant to have a kind of quake feel to it. Enjoy. Contains 26 Custom Textures from cncr04s. Cheers to Vogon for fixing the texture files! Custom Skybox from Karatekaefer Thanks to The Cheebs for testing it for me, and Dr. Ice for building cubemaps (CS:S crashes when I try for some reason). Have fun guys!
Please Download and Comment/Rate!!
